7 #Footer Footer

Toggle full screen Open in new window Toggle example guides Toggle HTML markup

Footer is displayed at the end of the page and it consists of logo, title and menu.

Example
Skip to main content
Code
Line
Daily
  • GitHub
  • Twitter
  • Facebook
Markup 
<div class="hf">
  <div class="w w--beta hf__inner">
    <a class="hf__skip" href="#main">Skip to main content</a>
    <div class="hf__logo">
      <span class="hf__img">
        <img class="hf__src" src="/gfx/svg/cld-logo.svg">
      </span>
      <span class="hf__cld">Code <br>Line <br>Daily</h1>
    </div>
    <nav class="hf__nav">
      <ul class="hf__list">
        <li class="hf__item">
          <a class="hf__link" href="#evergreen">GitHub</a>
        </li>
        <li class="hf__item">
          <a class="hf__link" href="#home">Twitter</a>
        </li>
        <li class="hf__item">
          <a class="hf__link" href="#archive">Facebook</a>
        </li>
      </ul>
    </nav>
  </div>
</div>
